verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, But <WH539>, behold, they will not believe me <WH8085>, nor hearken unto my voice <WH6963>; for they will say <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3068> hath not appeared unto thee <WH7200>.
